sentences.en: A General Election will be held which will seal his destiny one way or the other.
sentences.cn: 一场决定他命运的大选即将举行。

sentences.en: A shop girl was the destiny prefigured for the newcomer.
sentences.cn: 他们事先认为她可以做个女店员.

sentences.en: Can you be master of your destiny?
sentences.cn: 你能掌握自己的命运 吗 ?

sentences.en: Destiny has ordained that they are who they are.
sentences.cn: 命运已经决定了他们的性格为人。

sentences.en: His eyes - and it was my destiny to know them - were large and handsome.
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛 -- 我不得不仔细辨认的 -- 大而美.

sentences.en: I felt dread, knowing that they were debating my destiny.
sentences.cn: 我感到可怕, 因为我知道他们正在议论我的命运问题.

sentences.en: Is it destiny that brings people together, or is it accident?
sentences.cn: 人们的相遇是天意还是偶然？

sentences.en: It is my destiny one day to be king.
sentences.cn: 我命中注定有一天要成为国王。

sentences.en: It was her destiny to become famous.
It was his destiny never to see her again.
sentences.cn: 命运注定他再也见不着她.

sentences.en: Nancy wondered whether it was her destiny to live in England and marry Melvyn.
sentences.cn: 南希想知道她生活在英格兰又嫁给梅尔文是不是命运的安排。

sentences.en: She always had a strong sense of destiny .
She had always been mistress of her own destiny.
sentences.cn: 她总是能够掌握自己的命运。

sentences.en: She's a sentimental woman who believes marriage comes by destiny.
sentences.cn: 她是多愁善感的人,她相信姻缘命中注定.

sentences.en: The destiny of the world is at stake.
sentences.cn: 目前世界的命运正受到威胁.

sentences.en: The Prince's destiny was predetermined from the moment of his birth.
sentences.cn: 从出生的那一刻起，王子的命运就已经被预先决定了。

sentences.en: We are masters of our own destiny.
sentences.cn: 我们是自己命运的主宰者。

words.tran_cn: 注定（destine的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: the things that will happen to someone in the future, especially those that cannot be changed or controlled
